00023 {
00024     //********************************************************************************

00031     public function preinit()
00032     {
00033         //  Call daddy
00034         parent::preinit();
00035 
00036         //  Attach our api behavior
00037         $this->attachBehavior( $this->getInternalName(), 'pogostick.behaviors.CPSOAuthBehavior' );
00038     }

00040     /***
00041     * Fetches a protected resource using the tokens stored
00042     * 
00043     * @param string $sUrl
00044     * @param array $arArgs
00045     * @param string $sMethod
00046     * @param array $arHeaders Headers to add to the call
00047     */
00048     protected function makeRequest( $sAction, $arRequestData = array(), $sMethod = null, $arHeaders = array() )
00049     {
00050         //  Default...
00051         $_arRequestData = $this->requestData;
00052         $_arReqArgs = array();
00053         $_bRequireAuth = false;
00054         $_sResults = null;
00055 
00056         //  Check data...
00057         if ( null != $arRequestData ) $_arRequestData = array_merge( $_arRequestData, $arRequestData );
00058 
00059         //  Add the request data to the Url...
00060         if ( is_array( $this->requestMap )  )
00061         {
00062             $_arMap = ( isset( $this->requestMap[ $this->apiToUse ][ $sAction ] ) ) ? $this->requestMap[ $this->apiToUse ][ $sAction ] : null;
00063             $_arOptions = ( isset( $_arMap[ 'options' ] ) ) ? $_arMap[ 'options' ] : null;
00064             $_arReqOneOf = ( isset( $_arOptions[ '_requireOneOf' ] ) ) ? $_arOptions[ '_requireOneOf' ] : null;
00065             $_sMethod = ( isset( $_arOptions[ '_method' ] ) ) ? $_arOptions[ '_method' ] : ( null != $sMethod ) ? $sMethod : CPSApiBehavior::HTTP_GET;
00066             $_arParams = ( isset( $_arParams[ 'params' ] ) ) ? $_arParams[ 'params' ] : null;
00067 
00068             $_bThere = ( null == $_arReqOneOf );
00069             
00070             //  Build our query
00071             if ( is_array( $_arParams ) )
00072             {
00073                 foreach ( $_arParams as $_sKey => $_bRequired )
00074                 {
00075                     //  Check required items
00076                     if ( null != $_arReqOneOf && ! $_bThere )
00077                         $_bThere = in_array( $_sKey, $_arReqOneOf );
00078 
00079                     if ( $_bRequired && ! isset( $_arRequestData[ $_sKey ] ) )
00080                     {
00081                         throw new CException(
00082                             Yii::t(
00083                                 __CLASS__,
00084                                 'Required parameter {param} was not included in requestData',
00085                                 array(
00086                                     '{param}' => $_sKey,
00087                                 )
00088                             )
00089                         );
00090                     }
00091 
00092                     //  Add to query string if set...
00093                     if ( isset( $_arRequestData[ $_sKey ] ) )
00094                         $_arReqArgs[ $_sKey ] = $_arRequestData[ $_sKey ];
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         }
00098 
00099         //  Check requireOneOf option...
00100         if ( ! $_bThere )
00101         {
00102             throw new CException(
00103                 Yii::t(
00104                     __CLASS__,
00105                     'This call requires one of the following parameters: {params}',
00106                     array(
00107                         '{param}' => implode( ', ', $_requireOneOf ),
00108                     )
00109                 )
00110             );
00111         }
00112 
00113         //  Build the url...
00114         $_sUrl = $this->apiBaseUrl . '/' . $this->apiToUse . ( ( $sAction == '/' ) ? '' : '/' . $sAction ) . '.json';
00115 
00116         //  Handle events...
00117         $_oEvent = new CPSApiEvent( $_sUrl, $_arReqArgs, null, $this );
00118         $this->onBeforeApiCall( $_oEvent );
00119 
00120         //  Make the call...
00121         try
00122         {
00123             $_arToken = $this->getToken();
00124             if ( $this->getOAuthObject()->setToken( $_arToken[ 'oauth_token' ], $_arToken[ 'oauth_token_secret' ] ) )
00125             {
00126                 if ( $this->getOAuthObject()->fetch( $_sUrl, $_arReqArgs, $_sMethod, $arHeaders ) )
00127                 {
00128                     //  Get results...
00129                     $_sResults = $this->getOAuthObject()->getLastResponse();
00130                 }
00131                 else
00132                 {
00133                     //  Get error response
00134                 }
00135             }
00136         }
00137         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00138         {
00139             $_sResults = null;
00140             CPSLog::error( 'pogostick.base', Yii::t( $this->getInternalName(), 'Error making OAuth fetch request in {class}: {message}', array( "{class}" => get_class( $this ), 'message' => $_ex->getMessage() ) ) );
00141         }
00142 
00143         //  Handle events...
00144         $_oEvent->urlResults = $_sResults;
00145         $this->onAfterApiCall( $_oEvent );
00146 
00147         //  Raise our completion event...
00148         $_oEvent->setUrlResults( $_sResults );
00149         $this->onRequestComplete( $_oEvent );
00150 
00151         //  If user doesn't want JSON output, then reformat
00152         switch ( $this->format )
00153         {
00154             case 'xml':
00155                 $_sResults = CPSTransform::arrayToXml( json_decode( $_sResults, true ), 'Results' );
00156                 break;
00157                 
00158             case 'json':
00159                 //  Already in array format
00160                 break;
00161 
00162             case 'array':
00163                 $_sResults = json_decode( $_sResults );
00164                 break;
00165         }
00166 
00167         //  Return results...
00168         return $_sResults;
00169     }
00170 }
